02009                     /* this entry combined/coalesced, but still need to invoke miss_cb */
02010                     MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02011                     cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02012                     cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02013                     if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02014                       MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,cp->next_level->latency); /* restarts speculative scheduling */
02015                     break;
02016                   }
02017                   else
02018                   {
02019                     cache_assert(!MSHR->MSHR_linked,(void)0);
02020                     /* there is no next level, enqueue to the memory controller */                     
02021                         //fprintf(stdout,"\n[%lld][UnCore%d]Uncore Enqueue 0x%llx",sim_cycle,cp->uncore->node_ip,MSHR->paddr);
02022                       if(cp->uncore->enqueuable())
02023                       {
02025 
02026                         cp->uncore->enqueue(cp,MSHR->cmd,MSHR->paddr,cp->linesize,MSHR->action_id,bank/* our MSHR bank */,index/*our MSHR index*/,MSHR->op,MSHR->cb,MSHR->get_action_id);
02027                         MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02028                         cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02029                         cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02030                         if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02031                         {
02032                           MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,BIG_LATENCY);
02033                         }
02034                         break;
02035                       }
02036                   }
02037                 }
02038               }
02039             }
02040           }
02041         }
02042       }
02043       else
02044       {
02045         /* Prioritized handling of MSHR requests by type (read, write, prefetch, writeback) */
02046         int sent_something = false;
02047         int c;
02048 
02049         for(c=0;c<4 && !sent_something;c++)
02050         {
02051           enum cache_command cmd = cp->MSHR_cmd_order[c];
02052 
02053           for(b=0;b<cp->MSHR_banks;b++)
02054           {
02055             int bank = (start_point+b) & cp->MSHR_mask;
02056             if(cp->MSHR_num[bank])
02057             {
02058               work_found = true;
02059               MSHR_work_found = true;
02060               /* find oldest not-processed entry */
02061               if((!cp->next_bus || bus_free(cp->next_bus)) && (cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] > 0))
02062               {
02063                 tick_t oldest_age = TICK_T_MAX;
02064                 int index = -1;
02065 
02066                 for(int i=0;i<cp->MSHR_size;i++)
02067                 {
02068                   struct cache_action_t * MSHR = &cp->MSHR[bank][i];
02069                   if((MSHR->cmd == cmd) && MSHR->cb && (MSHR->when_started == TICK_T_MAX) && (!MSHR->translated_cb || MSHR->translated_cb(MSHR->op,MSHR->action_id))) /* if DL1, don't go until translated */
02070                   {
02071                     if(MSHR->when_enqueued < oldest_age)
02072                     {
02073                       oldest_age = MSHR->when_enqueued;
02074                       index = i;
02075                     }
02076                   }
02077                 }
02078 
02079                 if(index != -1)
02080                 {
02081                   struct cache_action_t * MSHR = &cp->MSHR[bank][index];
02082 
02083                   /* If this operation is waiting on a TLB miss, it could take awhile. Invoke the miss
02084                      callback function to reduce replays. */
02085                   if(!MSHR->miss_cb_invoked && (MSHR->translated_cb && !MSHR->translated_cb(MSHR->op,MSHR->action_id)))
02086                   {
02087                     if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02088                     {
02089 #ifdef ZTRACE
02090                       ztrace_print("%s|miss",cp->name);
02091 #endif
02092                       MSHR->miss_cb_invoked = true;
02093                       MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,BIG_LATENCY);
02094                     }
02095                   }
02096 
02097                   assert((MSHR->cmd == cmd) && MSHR->cb);
02098 
02099                   if(MSHR->MSHR_linked)
02100                   {
02101                     /* this entry combined/coalesced, but still need to invoke miss_cb */
02102                     MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02103                     cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02104                     cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02105                     if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02106                       MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,cp->next_level->latency); /* restarts speculative scheduling */
02107                     sent_something = true;
02108                     break;
02109                   }
02110                   else
02111                   {
02112                     cache_assert(!MSHR->MSHR_linked,(void)0);
02113 
02114                       //fprintf(stdout,"\n[%lld][UnCore%d]Uncore Enqueue 0x%llx",sim_cycle,cp->uncore->node_ip,MSHR->paddr);
02115                     if(cp->uncore->enqueuable())
02116                     {
02117                       cp->uncore->enqueue(cp,MSHR->cmd,MSHR->paddr,cp->linesize,MSHR->action_id,bank/* our MSHR bank */,index/*our MSHR index*/,MSHR->op,MSHR->cb,MSHR->get_action_id);
02118                       //bus_use(uncore->fsb,(MSHR->cmd==CACHE_WRITE||MSHR->cmd==CACHE_WRITEBACK)?(cp->linesize>>uncore->fsb_DDR):1,MSHR->cmd==CACHE_PREFETCH);
02119                       MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02120                       cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02121                       cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02122                       if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02123                       {
02124                           MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,BIG_LATENCY);
02125                       }
02126                       sent_something = true;
02127                       break;
02128                     }                   
02129                   }
02130                 }
02131               }
02132             }
02133           }
02134         }
02135       }
02136     }
02137     else /* bus not available */
02138     {
02139       /* were there any outstanding requests anyway? */
02140       for(b=0;b<cp->MSHR_banks;b++)
02141       {
02142         int bank = (start_point+b) & cp->MSHR_mask;
02143         if(cp->MSHR_num[bank])
02144         {
02145           work_found = true;
02146           MSHR_work_found = true;
02147           break;
02148         }
02149       }
02150     }
02151   }
02152   cp->check_for_MSHR_work = MSHR_work_found;
02153 
02154   /* occupancy stats */
02155   int bank;
02156   int max_size = cp->MSHR_banks * cp->MSHR_size;
02157   int total_occ = 0;
02158   for(bank=0;bank<cp->MSHR_banks;bank++)
02159   {
02160     total_occ += cp->MSHR_num[bank];
02161   }
02162   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.MSHR_occupancy += total_occ;)
02163   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.MSHR_full_cycles += (total_occ == max_size);)
02164 
02165   max_size = cp->MSHR_banks * cp->WBB_size;
02166   total_occ = 0;
02167   for(bank=0;bank<cp->MSHR_banks;bank++)
02168   {
02169     total_occ += cp->WBB_num[bank];
02170   }
02171   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.WBB_occupancy += total_occ;)
02172   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.WBB_full_cycles += (total_occ == max_size);)
02173 
02174   cp->check_for_work = work_found;
02175 }
02176 
02177 /* Attempt to enqueue a prefetch request, based on the predicted
02178    prefetch addresses in the prefetch FIFO (PFF) */
02179 static void cache_prefetch_llc(struct cache_t * const cp)
02180 {
02181   /* if the PF controller says the bus hasn't been too busy */
02182   if(!cp->PF_sample_interval || (cp->PF_state == PF_OK))
02183   {
02184     /* check prefetch FIFO for new prefetch requests - max one per cycle */
02185     if(cp->PFF && cp->PFF_num)
02186     {
02187       md_paddr_t pf_addr = cp->PFF[cp->PFF_head].addr;
02188       struct core_t * core = cp->PFF[cp->PFF_head].core; // tracks originating/owner core
02189       const int bank = GET_MSHR_BANK(pf_addr);
02190 
02191       if((cp->MSHR_num[bank] < cp->prefetch_threshold) /* if MSHR is too full, don't add more requests */
02192          && (cp->MSHR_num_pf[bank] < cp->prefetch_max))
02193       {
02194         md_addr_t pf_PC = cp->PFF[cp->PFF_head].PC;
02195         if(cache_enqueuable(cp,DO_NOT_TRANSLATE,pf_addr))
02196         {
02197           cache_enqueue(core,cp,NULL,CACHE_PREFETCH,DO_NOT_TRANSLATE,pf_PC,pf_addr,(seq_t)-1,bank,NO_MSHR,NULL,dummy_callback,NULL,NULL,NULL);
02198           cp->PFF_head = modinc(cp->PFF_head,cp->PFF_size); //(cp->PFF_head+1) % cp->PFF_size;
02199           cp->PFF_num --;
02200           cache_assert(cp->PFF_num >= 0,(void)0);
02201         }
02202       }
02203     }
02204   }
02205 }
02206 
02207 /* Update the bus-utilization-based prefetch controller. */
02208 static void prefetch_controller_update_llc(struct cache_t * const cp)
02209 {
02210   if(cp->PF_sample_interval && ((sim_cycle % cp->PF_sample_interval) == 0))
02211   {
02212     int current_sample = cp->stat.uncore_utilization;
02213     double duty_cycle = (current_sample - cp->PF_last_sample) / (double) cp->PF_sample_interval;
02214     if(duty_cycle < cp->PF_low_watermark)
02215         cp->PF_state = PF_OK;
02216     else if(duty_cycle > cp->PF_high_watermark)
02217       cp->PF_state = PF_REFRAIN;
02218     /* else stay in current state */
02219     cp->PF_last_sample = current_sample;
02220   }
02221 }
02222 
02223 void step_LLC_PF_controller(struct uncore_t * const uncore)
02224 {
02225   /* update prefetch controllers */
02226   prefetch_controller_update_llc(uncore->LLC);
02227 }
02228 
02229 void prefetch_LLC(struct uncore_t * const uncore)
02230 {
02231   cache_prefetch_llc(uncore->LLC);
02232 }
02233 
02234 /* Make use of the bus, thereby making it NOT free for some number of cycles hence */
02235 void uncore_utilize(struct cache_t * const cp)
02236 {
02237   /*This keeps track of the number of times the uncore is accesed, It is used to make prefetch decisions, Originally zesto used the stat of FSB utilization*/
02238   cp->stat.uncore_utilization += 1;
02239 }
